SecurityAuthentication.description: Security and authentication settings across all modules

bluetoothEnabledResponse.description: Response type for Bluetooth enabled state

gpsEnabledResponse.description: Response type for GPS enabled state

nfcEnabledResponse.description: Response type for NFC enabled state

wifiEnabledResponse.description: Response type for WiFi enabled state

minVersion.description: Minimum version required for password features

canViewPasswordAsPlainTextAtLoginEnabled.description: Whether password can be viewed as plain text at login

showForgotUserIdButtonOnInvalidLoginCont.description: Whether to show forgot user ID button on invalid login

shouldUsePlainTextForShowHidePasswordTog.description: Whether to use 'Show' or 'Hide' text instead of eye-ball icon

passwordResetCannotContainSSNumber.description: Whether password reset cannot contain social security number

expirationDays.description: Number of days after which passwords expire

warningDays.description: Number of days before expiration to show warning

graceLogins.description: Number of grace logins allowed after password expiration

minimumVersion.description: Minimum version required for password expiration

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for password expiration

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for password expiration

historySize.description: Number of previous passwords to remember

preventReuse.description: Whether to prevent reuse of previous passwords

reuseDays.description: Number of days before a password can be reused

minimumVersion.description: Minimum version required for password history

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for password history

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for password history

requireUppercase.description: Whether passwords must contain uppercase characters

requireLowercase.description: Whether passwords must contain lowercase characters

requireNumbers.description: Whether passwords must contain numeric characters

requireSpecialCharacters.description: Whether passwords must contain special characters

minUniqueCharacters.description: Minimum number of unique characters required

preventUsernamePart.description: Whether to prevent username from being part of password

preventSocialSecurityNumber.description: Whether to prevent social security number from being part of password

minimumVersion.description: Minimum version required for password complexity

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for password complexity

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for password complexity

threshold.description: Number of failed attempts before lockout

resetCounterAfter.description: Minutes after which the failed attempt counter resets

notifyUser.description: Whether to notify user of lockout

notifyAdmin.description: Whether to notify admin of lockout

requireAdminUnlock.description: Whether admin unlock is required after lockout

minimumVersion.description: Minimum version required for password lockout

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for password lockout

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for password lockout

enabled.description: Whether quick access PIN is enabled

resetDate.description: Date after which users must create a new PIN

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for PIN change

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for PIN change

shouldLoadWhenCardListLoads.description: Whether to load PIN change when card list loads

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for PIN encryption

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for PIN encryption

accessControl.description: Access control settings including RBAC and tiered access

enabled.description: Whether role-based access control is enabled

restrictByAccount.description: Whether to restrict access by account

quickAccessForSubUsers.description: Whether quick access is enabled for sub-users

includedInSubPermissions.description: Whether cross accounts are included in sub-account permissions

subUsersCanUse.description: Whether sub-users can use cross accounts

minVersion.description: Minimum version required for multi-account access

mobileEnabled.description: Whether mobile multi-account access is enabled

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version for multi-account access

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version for multi-account access

lastNameMatching.description: Last name matching settings for multi-account access

charactersToMatch.description: Number of characters to match for last name matching

minVersion.description: Minimum version required for out-of-band authentication

isLoginAction.description: Whether this is a login action

isFallback.description: Whether this is a fallback rule

mfaTextQuestionsEnabled.description: Whether MFA text questions are enabled

mfaSecurityCodeEnabled.description: Whether MFA security code is enabled

mfaChallengeOptSecurityCodes.description: Whether to use challenge opt security codes

setFocusOnFirst.description: Whether to set focus on first question

securityCodeRetryCount.description: Number of retry attempts allowed for security code

securityCodeShouldUseCaseSensitiveCompar.description: Whether security code comparison is case sensitive

securityCodeQuestionID.description: ID of the security code question

minVersion.description: Minimum version required for freeform MFA

enablePlainTextAnswers.description: Whether to allow plain text answers instead of pre-set answers

challengeViewQuestionCount.description: Number of questions to show on challenge page

enabled.description: Whether SMS security code is enabled

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for password encryption

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for password encryption

minimumServerVersion.description: Minimum server version required for password encryption

minimumVersion.description: Minimum version required for forgot username

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for forgot username

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for forgot username

enabled.description: Whether forgot username recovery is enabled

minVersion.description: Minimum version required for password features

canViewPasswordAsPlainTextAtLoginEnabled.description: Whether password can be viewed as plain text at login

showForgotUserIdButtonOnInvalidLoginCont.description: Whether to show forgot user ID button on invalid login

shouldUsePlainTextForShowHidePasswordTog.description: Whether to use 'Show/Hide' text instead of eye icon for password toggle

passwordResetCannotContainSSNumber.description: Whether password reset cannot contain social security number

minimumVersion.description: Minimum version required for password reset

enabled.description: Whether mobile password reset is enabled

isUsernameRequired.description: Whether username is required for password reset

autoPrompt.description: Whether to automatically prompt for biometric authentication

minimumVersion.description: Minimum version required for biometric authentication

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for biometric authentication

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for biometric authentication

enabled.description: Whether eye scan authentication is enabled

minimumVersion.description: Minimum version required for eye scan

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for eye scan

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for eye scan

apiKey.description: API key for eye scan vendor

enabled.description: Whether face unlock authentication is enabled

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for face unlock

duration.description: Duration in minutes before session times out

warningTime.description: Time in minutes before timeout to show warning

extendOnActivity.description: Whether to extend session on user activity

maxSessions.description: Maximum number of concurrent sessions per user

preventNewLogin.description: Whether to prevent new login when max sessions reached

terminateOldest.description: Whether to terminate oldest session when max sessions reached

persistentSessions.description: Whether to allow persistent sessions (remember me)

maxPersistentDays.description: Maximum number of days to persist session

requireReauthentication.description: Whether to require reauthentication for sensitive operations

minimumVersion.description: Minimum version required for session management

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for session management

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for session management
